text: Carl Frederick Kendall Palmer (born 20 March 1950) is an English drummer and percussionist. He became well known in the 1960s. He was a member of a number of famous English bands: the Crazy World of Arthur Brown, Atomic Rooster, Emerson, Lake & Palmer, and Asia. Palmer was added into the Modern Drummer Hall of Fame in 1989. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:English songwriters Category:English rock drummers Category:Musicians from Birmingham Category:Writers from Birmingham
title: Carl Palmer
